## Carga de datos

```{r}
load("~/Desktop/MASTER/R/GitHub/datos/accidentes2020_data.rda")
library(tidyverse)
accidentes2020_data
accidentes <- accidentes2020_data |> 
  as_tibble()
  
```

---

## Resumen

```{r}
resumen <- accidentes |> count(sexo)
```

--- 

## Visualizaci√≥n

```{r}
ggplot(resumen) +
  geom_col(aes(x = sexo, y = n, fill = sexo), alpha = 0.6) +
  ggthemes::scale_fill_colorblind() +
  theme_minimal()
```
